name: Sam's ArtHunt: Jacksepticeye fangame
description:
PLOT:
While Jack's getting ready the video for #the SepticArt event, he understands that he might have bitten more than he could chew. But fear not! for Sam is always here to help. Now you are Sam and you have to help Sean out!
How far can you go? The fate of hundreds of arts lies on your shoulders!

Oh, I didn't want to put any pressure on you, bu-ut... Anti doesn't seem to like this idea. He may also have sent his minions for your soul... still, you'll handle it, right? 

Good luck, Sammy!

AUTHOR'S WORDS:

Hello! Thanks for checking out this page in the first place! :)
It's a very simple game made in Unity 5/Unity 2017. Hope you'll like it! But if not, please tell me what you didn't like. Maybe I can make SamsArtHunt better with your contribution, who knows?
You can both play it online here or download it on your flash driver, or whatever, as you wish. Both versions will be updated equally frequent.
